#####################################################################
function(buildexample execname sourcename)
  add_executable (${execname} ${sourcename})
  target_link_libraries (${execname} calceph ${LIBM_LIBRARIES})
endfunction(buildexample)

#####################################################################
# C language
buildexample(csingle csingle.c)
buildexample(cmultiple cmultiple.c)
buildexample(cscompute cscompute.c)
buildexample(cerror cerror.c)
buildexample(corder corder.c)
buildexample(corient corient.c)

#####################################################################
# Fortran language
if (ENABLE_FORTRAN)
    buildexample(f2003single f2003single.f)
    buildexample(f2003multiple f2003multiple.f)
    buildexample(f2003scompute f2003scompute.f)
    buildexample(f2003error f2003error.f)
    buildexample(f2003orient f2003orient.f)
    buildexample(f77single f77single.f)
    buildexample(f77multiple f77multiple.f)
    buildexample(f77error f77error.f)
    buildexample(f77orient f77orient.f)
endif()
